title: Scale a Value
description:
SCALE_R scales an input value REAL and calculates an output value in
REAL. The input value X is limited here to I_LO and I_HI. SCALE_D
(IN,4,20,0,100) scales an input with 4 .. 20mA to the output 0..100.
SCALE_R can also be negative output values and work with a negative sloï¿¾pe, the values I_LO and I_HI but must always be specifed that ILO < I_HI.
name: SCALE_R

input.name: I_LO
input.description: The lower bound of the input range.

input.name: I_HI
input.description: The upper bound of the input range.

input.name: O_LO
input.description: The lower bound of the output range.

input.name: O_HI
input.description: The upper bound of the output range.

output.name: SCALE_R
output.description: The scaled output value corresponding to the input value X.

return_value.description: The final scaled value based on the input parameters.
